subtitle: A mouth-watering hot dessert that is easy to make and will be enjoyed by all the family.

method.text: Peel, halve, core and coarsely chop apples.
Generously grease inside of an ovenproof dish with butter. Add apples.
Put apple juice into a pan with vanilla essence and granulated sugar. Stir over a gentle heat until sugar has dissolved.
Pour the vanilla and apple syrup over apples. Cover with foil. Bake in oven for 15 min.
